item.title: Fuck Off With The Nazi Shit.
item.description: Honestly sick of it. Get your shit together, Imgur mod team. It is not hard. Follow these 4 rules and you will make the site much better. 1. Mature content tagged as mature should be left the fuck alone. That is what the FUCKING tag is there for. 2. Remove all the sex ads. For a group of prudish braindead assholes, you sure are willing to accept ad revenue from some fucked up places. 3. Stop banning people for posting sexy stuff as long as it is tagged properly. Killing your already limited content base is just stupid. 4. START banning the Nazis and their shit. Posting anything that is Pro Nazi should be taken down and they should get banned. It is a matter of morality and you fuckers refuse to have anything close to morals.
item.dc:creator: drousnavat

item.title: Lady Gaga answers the most offensive question ever.
item.description: As she said in a later interview: “The reason why I didn’t answer the question is because I didn’t feel like a victim with that lie. But I thought about, like, what about a kid who is being accused of that who would think that a public figure like me would feel shame?” Gaga told Gates. “I’ve been in situations where fixing a rumor was not in the best interest of the well-being of other people. In that case, I tried to be thought-provoking and disruptive in another way. I tried to use the misinformation to create another disruptive point.” 1000% Chaotic Good. edit: Riight…so I don't usually do a "wow FP omg" edit, because I'm cool and have a ton of FP stuff…but to land this as an FP in the middle of a protest is kinda real. Like, y'all were rightfully posting all your anti-Nazi shit and I still made it through…<3

item.title: Roblox is a disgusting company run by pedophiles and more people need to be aware
item.description:
My reaction to every stage of this fucked up nightmare saga. Not enough people know what's going on. If you are a parent or know children who play Roblox, please, I am begging you, get them on a different game. Here we go: Many years ago, a Roblox user named Schlep ( https://www.youtube.com/@RealSchlep ), underage at the time, was abused by a popular player. In response, he made it his life's work to catch pedophiles on his favourite game. He did it entirely within the bounds of the law, even teaming up with his local police department. He successfully took down FOUR predators who were using Roblox to lure children. Arguably a good thing to do. The only people who could possibly be upset by this are pedophiles, yes?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hMqAw_NjHK8 Roblox banned him. Not only did they ban him, they targeted anything remotely related to him and removed it from their platform entirely. They said he was a dangerous vigilante, who broke the platform's Terms of Service. In response, Schlep dropped this video, disputing all the allegations. It drew plenty of attention, including that of Chris Hansen. I'm sure I don't need to tell you who that is. His fans kept making "Free Schlep" content in Roblox, which was all removed. The CEO responded personally by accusing Schlep of being "just as bad as the predators," and began months worth of smear campaigning, while Schlep turned to lawyers.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vIcVPPOB8TQ Seriously, if you're on the wrong side of Chris Hansen, you really need to start asking some major questions.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6dksQJulz4c Last month, things spiked. In spite of Schlep's insistence that no one at Roblox contact him except through his lawyer, the CEO himself reached out, privately. He offered to reinstate Schlep's account...if he would just...shut up. At the same time as he was begging Schlep to be quiet about the predators on his platform, the CEO was on stage, telling the same lies about him. Insisting he was a dangerous person, who they kicked off the platform for safety. And then, he turns around and announces that he wants to start a DATING PLATFORM ON ROBLOX. Yes, you read that right, the CEO of a children's game accused of harbouring predators wants to include DATING. He's on camera saying that the predators are an "opportunity". Some people say he meant they're an opportunity to 'increase security', but let's examine that. In the video above, Schlep is on stage with Chris Hansen and an actual police officer, discussing the state of Roblox. This officer mentions that he reached out to Roblox, personally, offering very basic things they could change to increase safety for children on the platform. To which they did...nothing. And as of a few weeks ago, the CEO of Roblox went on record saying he was considering adding, and I quote, "Child Gambling". Roblox was a good platform for children. And it is still one of the most popular ones. Why am I making this post? In the hopes that parents will see it, will look at the videos, and will find out what a threat this game is to their children. Especially now that they've ramped up their advertising to every platform they can. During the holidays, when you see your extended family, make sure you're protecting your children, your siblings, your cousins, your niblings, and yourselves. Happy Holidays to all, and to all...what the fuck is happening to the world.
item.dc:creator: slinkiisu
